Description: Fragment from rim of pottery mortarium. Yellow-green clay, core light orange. Graffito inside below lip: ]ω[.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 402)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing 2006 / 'Drab Bowls' for Apollo: The Mortaria of Naukratis and Exchange in the Archaic Eastern Mediterranean (no.5,7)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (HA.07)
